tool_description: Extracts detailed morphological features from plant and fungi images including leaf shape, texture, color patterns, and growth characteristics for species identification.

specimen_type.description: Type of specimen: plant, mushroom, lichen, moss

color_analysis_depth.description: Color analysis level: basic, standard, detailed

texture_analysis.description: Whether to perform surface texture analysis

size_reference_object.description: Reference object in image for size estimation: coin, hand, ruler

error_messages: Invalid image path: Ensure image has been validated with Image Capture Validator first
Unsupported specimen type: Use plant, mushroom, lichen, or moss
Invalid focus area: Use recognized plant parts like leaves, stem, flowers, bark, roots, fruit
Analysis failed: Image quality insufficient for feature extraction, recapture with better lighting
usage: Provide validated image_path and specimen_type. Specify focus_areas for targeted analysis. Include size_reference_object if present in image for scale estimation.
